name: learning-snacks

commands.name: learning-snacks
commands.title: Learning Snacks
commands.description: Get your tasty bite of knowledge!

preferences.name: topic
preferences.title: Choose a topic for your Learning Snacks
preferences.description: Enter the topic you want to become an expert in.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
